To crack:

1.  Download and install torrent

2.  On this page move your mouse cursor over green skull image next to the uploader DibyaTPB

3.  Right click on green skull

4.  Choose "Save image as..."

5.  Save the image (vip.gif) in Diablo III install folder

6.  Change the name of the image to "Diablo Start.gif"

7.  You can now run and play the game!  Have fun!!

Look is not that hard to install the game follow these steps and you will be fine
Step1: Download emulator and Diablo III 
Step2: exact or mount D3 
Step3: exact emu (after the exaction emu will automatic create a folder "emulator V4" and inside that folder there will be  "mooege"  folder, so move "mooege" out of "emulatorv4" NOTE this is very important the "mooege" folder |||||HAVE TO BE||||| exactly to to my directory "C:Mooege".
step4: install D3 
step5: after you install D3 move it inside "mooege" and you NEED to renamed it to Diablo III This is also very important. 
step6: run Single play in C:MooegeDiablo III ip Injector 
Step7: some will ask for you to upgrade the patch and close the client some will not, if you are one  of those who need to upgrade your patch let it upgrade. then go and find Diablo 3 patch 1.0.3 exact it copy and replace the client in your original D3 folder(C:MooegeDiablo III) 
Step8: go here C:WindowsSystem32driversetc open your hosts file in notepad or wordpad and paste these line there
127.0.0.1 us.actual.battle.net
127.0.0.1 eu.actual.battle.net
127.0.0.1 enGB.nydus.battle.net
Step9: run Single player in C:MooegeDiablo III ip Injector again and if they give you error msg 3003 run BnetPatcher in C:Mooege try again and it will work.
